name: Combined Demo
description: A comprehensive demo combining various elements like graphics, music, and animation.

name: Prerendered Music
description: Music created using prerendered techniques, often with high-quality production values.

name: Tracked Music
description: Music created using tracking software, often with a distinct retro or chiptune sound.

name: Freestyle Graphics
description: Unrestricted graphical creations showcasing artistic freedom and creativity.

name: Oldschool Graphics
description: Graphics created in the style of or using techniques from earlier computing eras.

name: Freestyle Photo
description: Unrestricted photographic entries allowing for creative expression and editing.

name: Stop Motion
description: Animations created using stop motion techniques, bringing static objects to life.

name: Wild / Animation
description: A catch-all category for animations and other entries that don't fit elsewhere.
